name: oco
description: A system to allow a minimal set of web components
author: David Lorenz <David.Lorenz@mercedes-benz.io>

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/* 2>/dev/null ; ./node_modules/parcel-bundler/bin/cli.js build src/index.js src/sample/sample1.html; cp ./dist/sample/* ./dist/; rm -rf ./dist/sample
